pageTitle: Paige Denim Skyline Ankle Skinny Jeans | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements FIT NOTE: These jeans fit true to size compared to standard designer sizing. * Size & Fit * Made in the U.S.A. * Wash cold. * 98% cotton/2% spandex. * Fabrication: Denim. * 7.5" rise. 29" inseam. A light-wash pair you'll wear to shreds, these ankle skinny jeans feature 5-pocket styling and a single-button closure. Tonal stitching at back pockets and whiskering at front. Wrinkling at waistband and pockets. Shredded holes, worn spots, and heavy distressing. Description Paige Denim > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Pure sophistication with a casual Southern California vibe, the ever-growing Paige jeans empire is rooted in flawless fit from the girl who set the standard. A highly sought-after fit model for denim's heavy-hitters, Los Angeles native Paige Adams-Geller lends her fashion expertise to Paige Denim. Launched in 2004, the brand's instant success and celebrity following is attributed to its trend-setting styles, premium materials, and passion for quality fit, emanating the confidence of denim's "it girl."
